Carly was loving what she heard. She couldn't wait to see the look on his face when she took away his powers. His dignity. His self-worth. Just like he had done to her. "And what will we do with these powers once we take them away?"

"Don't worry about that. We'll figure that out. You'll finally get your revenge. That's what you need to focus on. After all these years, you can finally even the score."

Carly knew what she had to do. "Alright give me the gun, and let me handle the rest."

Jess was excited that she had agreed to do this, "Okay mom, but how are you gonna get him here?"

"Leave that to me," she said with a knowing grin, "Leave that to me."

A couple of days passed by, and The Hulk had failed to show up. Carly thought her phone call to him would get him here in hours. After all, he might have been repulsed by her, but he always had a soft spot for Jess. When he got the message that she was being held captive by a gang, and forced into prostitution, she thought he would come immediately.

She was pouring herself a drink, when the whole trailer shook. It bounced 4 feet up in the air and came crashing down, knocking the bottle of jack daniels out of her hand.
"Shit..." she cursed as she saw her bottle was completely empty. Her entire trailer was a mess, and she knew what had caused it. He was here.

The trailer door swung open, and Bruce stuck his enormous green head inside. He saw Carly fumbling around with the liqour bottle, somethings never change. She had changed, physically that is. Ten years ago Carly was a dancer, with a tight lithe body. Now, she was a mess. Soft, a little chubby, and she wore clothes that looked a size or two too small. What a waste, Bruce thought.

"Carly, where is Jess?" his voiced boomed as he spoke. She forgot just how big he was. His arm took up the entire doorway. "I'll be right out and I'll show you where they keep her," she said. She waited until he turned his back and she grabbed the gun. Her hands shook as she realized what was about to happen. She made sure the knob was in the right spot, just like Jess had shown her, and fired the beam right into Bruce. The effect was instantaneous. He rapidly began to shrink, losing all of his enormous muscle. His skin returned to a normal shade of pink as well.

Bruce put his hand to his head, "What the hell did you do to me?"

She laughed at him, looking small and weak. He wasn't special anymore. He was a nobody, just like her. "I took your precious powers away with this here special gun, " she patted it for affect. It actually felt heavier than before.

Bruce began to realize that he had walked into a trap. Jess was probably not in any danger at all, it was all just a ploy by this sick, wretched woman to try to make him as miserable as she was. He began to get angry, "Alright Carly playtime is over. Give me the gun, and go back to happy hour and we'll forget this ever happened."

He walked towards the door, but Carly slammed it shut, locking it before he could get in. Her heart raced as she was unsure of what to do. She thought about calling Jess, but she was in school. Bruce was banging on the door and yelling. Even though he had no powers, it was only a matter of moments before he would get in. She looked over at the gun. She could use it on herself, to make her strong like Jess. She saw the knob that had stored energy on it and slid it over to it. She closed her eyes and aimed the gun at herself, and then she pulled the trigger.

Her body was bathed in the beam, and she waited for the growth to start. It felt like a volcanic eruption inside her body. Her entire insides felt like they were about to explode as her muscles began to inflate rapidly. It was the most pleasureable feeling that she ever experienced as unlimited power began to course through her entire being. She felt herself rising up, her clothes were ripping, and she noticed that her skin was become green. GREEN! This was too good to be true. She wasn't just growing stronger. She was growing stronger than anyone else could ever be. She had given herself The Hulk's powers! That's what Jess and Robert planned on doing with this. But it wasn't going to happen. The powers were hers, and no one would ever take them away from her. She felt incredible. She flexed her enormous arms and was amazed at the size of her new muscles. She knew how strong Bruce was, and now it was all hers. All of the power, she could have anything she wanted. She could just take it now, and no one could do anything about it.

Bruce continued to bang on the door, knocking his shoulder into it. One more time should do the trick he thought. "Carly, this is your last chance. Open up now!" He waited a second, there was no response. he reared his body back when suddenly an enormous green arm shot through the other side of the door, knocking him down. He flew back ten feet, stunned by the impact. As he rubbed his head, an enormous green figure burst through the trailer. He had a horrified look on his face as he recognized who was in front of him. He looked up at the most enormous mountain of female muscle he had ever seen, and saw Carly towering over him with a wide, evil grin. He wasn't used to this perspective, it wasn't one he wanted to get used to.

She walked over towards Bruce who was lying helplessly on the floor. She was so much bigger than him it was comical. Her calf muscle alone looked bigger than his head.

"Well, well, well. If it isn't the Un-incredible Hulk, " she said. Mocking him, relishing in the role reversal that she had never even dreamed would ever take place.

"So...what do I do now..."
